name: Cauliflower Ceviche
description: This recipe for cauliflower ceviche is tangy, spicy, and refreshing. It is an easy to make appetizer. Serve with chips and avocado.

video.name: Cauliflower Ceviche
video.description: Cauliflower Ceviche, tangy, spicy, and refreshing. It is an easy to make appetizer. Made with a combination of cauliflower, tomato, onion, chile and lime juice.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring salted water to a boil in a large pot set to high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring salted water to a boil in a large pot set to high heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a large bowl with ice and water.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill a large bowl with ice and water.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop cauliflower into the boiling water and cook for 2 - 4 minutes. (see note)
recipeInstructions.name: Drop cauliflower into the boiling water and cook for 2 - 4 minutes. (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Drain cauliflower and place in the bowl with ice water. Let cool.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain cauliflower and place in the bowl with ice water. Let cool.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl combine the cauliflower, tomato, cucumber, onion, chile, cilantro, and lime juice and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl combine the cauliflower, tomato, cucumber, onion, chile, cilantro, and lime juice and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Season with salt and pepper, and let marinate for 30 min.
recipeInstructions.name: Season with salt and pepper, and let marinate for 30 min.

recipeInstructions.text: Adjust seasoning and serve on top of avocado halves with chips or tostadas.
recipeInstructions.name: Adjust seasoning and serve on top of avocado halves with chips or tostadas.
